snippet.title: Game Boy Longplay [058] Gargoyle´s Quest
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By: Tarosan

Gargoyle's Quest: Ghosts'n Goblins aka "Red Arremer: Hell Village Tale"), is a platform/side scrolling adventure game with mild role-playing video game elements from Capcom. It was released on May 2, 1990 in Japan and then in the United States and Canada in July. 
The main character Red Arremer (Firebrand in the US) made his debut in the video game series Ghosts'n Goblins. 

This is one of Capcom's underused game series... Firebrand is one of Capcom's badass characters and whilst the game was easy, Firebrand is the sole purpose for playing this, at least before Demon's Crest came along... This theme was remixed for Firebrand's theme on
Ultimate Marvel Vs Capcom 3. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
